item.title: Trump says a 'little disturbance' from tariffs is OK, as markets reel from trade war fears
item.description: President Donald Trump conceded before a joint session of Congress that his steep new tariffs will cause "a little disturbance."

item.title: Supreme Court denies Trump's request to cancel USAID payments for completed work
item.description: A divided Supreme Court declined to let President Donald Trump's administration withhold payment to foreign aid organizations for work they already pe...

item.title: Trump says the U.S. will take control of Greenland 'one way or the other'
item.description: Trump argued in a joint address to Congress that control of Greenland was crucial to U.S. national security.

item.title: Full Video: Rep. Al Green ejected from Trump address to Congress for heckling
item.description: "You're a liar!" yelled some Democrats at President Trump as he delivered a speech on Capitol Hill. Other Democratic members of Congress walked out.

item.title: Canada requests WTO consultations with U.S. over 'unjustified tariffs', says ambassador
item.description: Canada has requested consultations with the United States on "unjustified tariffs" at the World Trade Organization.
